data.text: The word that the Lord spake against Babylon and against the land of the Chaldeans by Jeremiah the prophet.
Declare ye among the nations, and publish, and set up a standard;
For out of the north there cometh up a nation against her,
In those days, and in that time, saith the Lord,
They shall ask the way to Zion with their faces thitherward, saying,
My people hath been lost sheep:
All that found them have devoured them:
Remove out of the midst of Babylon,
For lo, I will raise and cause to come up against Babylon
And Chaldea shall be a spoil:
Because ye were glad, because ye rejoiced,
Your mother shall be sore confounded;
Because of the wrath of the Lord it shall not be inhabited,
Put yourselves in array against Babylon round about:
Shout against her round about:
Cut off the sower from Babylon,
Israel is a scattered sheep;
Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel;
And I will bring Israel again to his habitation,
In those days, and in that time, saith the Lord,
Go up against the land of Merathaim, even against it,
A sound of battle is in the land,
How is the hammer of the whole earth cut asunder and broken!
I have laid a snare for thee, and thou art also taken, O Babylon,
The Lord hath opened his armoury,
Come against her from the utmost border,
Slay all her bullocks; let them go down to the slaughter:
The voice of them that flee and escape out of the land of Babylon,
Call together the archers against Babylon:
Therefore shall her young men fall in the streets,
Behold, I am against thee, O thou most proud,
And the most proud shall stumble and fall,
Thus saith the Lord of hosts;
Their redeemer is strong;
A sword is upon the Chaldeans, saith the Lord,
A sword is upon the liars; and they shall dote:
A sword is upon their horses, and upon their chariots,
A drought is upon her waters; and they shall be dried up:
Therefore the wild beasts of the desert
As God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah
Behold, a people shall come from the north,
They shall hold the bow and the lance:
The king of Babylon hath heard the report of them,
Behold, he shall come up like a lion from the swelling of Jordan
Therefore hear ye the counsel of the Lord,
At the noise of the taking of Babylon the earth is moved,
